text:
A local holiday has been declared for Tiruvarur district on February 19 in view of the sandanakoodu festival at the Muthupettai Dargah near Tiruthuraipoondi in Tiruvarur district. The event forms part of the annual Kandhuri festival. All government offices would remain closed in the district on the day.

However, treasuries would function with limited staff. February 27 will be a working day in lieu of the local holiday, Collector M.Mathivanan said in a press release.
title: Local holiday
